featuredProject.name: Portainer
featuredProject.description: Led frontend migration to React for a comprehensive container management platform used by thousands of developers worldwide.

caseStudy.problem: Legacy AngularJS codebase was becoming difficult to maintain and scale. The team needed to modernize the frontend while maintaining feature parity and zero downtime.
caseStudy.solution: Architected and led a phased migration to React with TypeScript. Implemented a micro-frontend approach allowing gradual migration. Created shared component library and established modern dev practices.
